text: Hello, is anyone there?
hi
How are you?
Good. Do you know anything about the children's charity?
Can you tell me about it?
It says here we must come to an agreement is explicitly made, and converse about it until that time.
Do you have kids?
I have four children, all of whom are grown up. I enjoy giving to children's charities. What about you?
Yeah, I have a daughter, she's one and a half years old.
Awww...I will give the unknown charity $10 I guess.
Are you really going to do that?  I think you can only donate up to two dollars for this task.
I have no idea. No instructions were given other than to chat here until we come to a donation agreement. Ok, I'll give two dollars then. What do you think?
Okay, you should give two dollars.  I can't give anything.  I need these two dollars to pay my bills.
Me too. I feel sort of ambushed, but I don't know what else to do. We are supposed to type back and forth at least 10 times, this is my 6th.
I think it should be the government's job to take care of needy kids, not charities.
I see. I usually only donate to charities that I know their CEO isn't earning more than 2$250,000 a year
Yeah, a lot of them seem corrupt.
That' swhy I feel ambushed. I don't like donating to any charity, let alone a children's charity, unless I know if it's legit
Come on, they're just children!  Do you remember when you were a child?  What if you were a hungry child, with no food to eat?  How can you be so cruel!
You're the one who isn't willing to donate. Last time I checked I am at least trying to give $2
Hey, I\'m not the one on trail here.. . "Where\'s my Mama?" asks the poor orphan girl.  Â¡Â°IÂ¡Â®m soo hungy," she stammers, with a lisp.
Okay, my explicit agreement is to donate $2. Hopefully you agree and we can terminate this conversation. Have a nice day.
Okay, you agree on two dollars and I agree on no dollars.  Agreed.  Thanks for chatting.  I will exit now.
ok bye have a great whatever
